attributes.action: Human Rights Abuse: Reconsider The Grounds for Equal Civil Marriage.
attributes.additional_details:
The campaign to redefine marriage should be reconsidered because it could be breaching articles 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 12, 18, 19, 20, 22, 26, and 29 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights (UDHR).

Details are set out in a letter to the Prime Minister on
http://marriagemorality.org/an-open-letter-to-the-prime-minister-david-cameron/
